dcterms:creator: David Pearce
dcterms:description: Aurora-4 is a broadband corpus designed for noisy speech recognition tasks based on the Wall Street Journal (WSJ0) corpus. It includes two microphone types and six noise types, resulting in four conditions: clean, channel, noisy, and channel+noisy.
dcterms:title: Aurora-4

dcterms:creator: Emmanuel Vincent
Shinji Watanabe
Aditya Arie Nugraha
Jon Barker
Ricard Marxer
dcterms:description: CHiME-4 contains real distant-talking recordings in noisy environments, providing a more realistic scenario for testing speech recognition systems.
dcterms:title: CHiME-4
